titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C18

body.ab:
<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0015__main__19"/>I
lay on my
straw
but I could not
<lb n="c57-0015__main__20"/>sleep –
I thought of the
occurences
of <lb n="c57-0015__main__21"/>the
day.–
What
cheifly
struck me was <lb n="c57-0015__main__22"/>the gentle manners of these
people,
and <lb n="c57-0015__main__23"/>I longed to join
them
but dared
not.—
<lb n="c57-0015__main__24"/>I remembered too well the treatment I <lb n="c57-0015__main__25"/>had suffered the night before
from<lb n="c57-0015__main__26"/>the
barbarous
villagers
and
resolved
<lb n="c57-0015__main__27"/>whatever
<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2788__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2788__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2791__Start"/>should<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2791__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>course
of conduct I
might<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2800__Start"/>afterwards<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2800__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2803__Start"/>think it<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2803__End"/>hereafter consider<lb n="c57-0015__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2809__Start"/>right to do<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2809__End"/>it proper
to
pursue
that for the present I would <lb n="c57-0015__main__29"/>remain quietly in my
hovel watching
<lb n="c57-0015__main__30"/>and endeavouring to discover the
motive<lb n="c57-0016__main__1"/>of
their
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2827__Start"/>motions<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2827__End"/> actions.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__2"/>The<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>cottagers
arose the next morning before <lb n="c57-0016__main__3"/>the
sun;–
The young woman arranged the
<lb n="c57-0016__main__4"/>cottage &<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2849__Start"/>per<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2849__End"/>
prepared the food; & the <lb n="c57-0016__main__5"/>youth
mounted on a large strange animal <lb n="c57-0016__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2855__Start"/>road<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2855__End"/> rode away. This
day was passed in <lb n="c57-0016__main__7"/>the same routine
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2863__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2863__End"/>as the preceeding one.
<lb n="c57-0016__main__8"/>The
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2872__Start"/>young<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2872__End"/>
young man was constantly <lb n="c57-0016__main__9"/>employed out of
doors
and the girl in <lb n="c57-0016__main__10"/>various laborious occupations
within..—
The old
<lb n="c57-0016__main__11"/>man
whom I soon perceived to be
blind
<lb n="c57-0016__main__12"/>employed his leisure hours
in playing
<lb n="c57-0016__main__13"/>on his
instrument
or in
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2895__Start"/>pesively<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2895__End"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__14"/>contemplation –
Nothing could exceed <lb n="c57-0016__main__15"/>the love & respect
that
the younger <lb n="c57-0016__main__16"/>cottagers
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2907__Start"/>bore<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2907__End"/>shewed
towards
this
venerable
<lb n="c57-0016__main__17"/>old man –
They performed towards
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him
every <lb n="c57-0016__main__18"/>little office of
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2931__Start"/>love<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2931__End"/>affection&
duty with gentleness; <lb n="c57-0016__main__19"/>and he rewarded them by his
benevo <lb n="c57-0016__main__20"/>lent smiles. <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2942__Start"/>B<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2942__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__21"/>They
were not
however
entirely
<lb n="c57-0016__main__22"/>happy–The <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2951__Start"/>youth<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2951__End"/> young<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2954__Start"/>er<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2954__End"/> man<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2957__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2957__End"/>&
his
<lb n="c57-0016__main__23"/>companion,
often
retired into a corner <lb n="c57-0016__main__24"/>of their common room and wept.
I saw <lb n="c57-0016__main__25"/>no cause for
this unhappiness
but <lb n="c57-0016__main__26"/>I was deeply affected by
it –
If such <lb n="c57-0016__main__27"/>lovely creatures were
miserable
it was <lb n="c57-0016__main__28"/>less strange that
<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2973__Start"/>alone<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2975__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2975__End"/><del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2973__End"/>
I, an imperfect <lb n="c57-0016__main__29"/>and solitary
being
should be
wretched—<lb n="c57-0017__main__1"/>yet
why were these gentle beings
un <lb n="c57-0017__main__2"/>happy –
they
poss<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>essed
a delightful house
<lb n="c57-0017__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0017__left_margin__1"/>for
such
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it
was in my
eyes)
and every
<lb n="c57-0017__main__4"/>luxury.
they had a fire to warm <lb n="c57-0017__main__5"/>them when
chill
and delicious
viands<lb n="c57-0017__main__6"/>when hungry–
they were dressed
<lb n="c57-0017__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3036__Start"/>in clothes that kept t<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3036__End"/>
in
excel <lb n="c57-0017__main__8"/>lent clothes and
still
more
they
enjoy <lb n="c57-0017__main__9"/>ed
one
anothers
company &
speech — and <del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3046__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3046__End"/><lb n="c57-0017__main__10"/><lb n="c57-0017__left_margin__1"/>interchanged
each day looks of affection &
kindness–
<lb n="c57-0017__main__11"/>What did their tears
mean?
Did they <lb n="c57-0017__main__12"/>really express pain? I was at first <lb n="c57-0017__main__13"/>unable to solve these
questions
but <lb n="c57-0017__main__14"/>perpetual
attention
and
time
<lb n="c57-0017__main__15"/>explained to me many
of the appear <lb n="c57-0017__main__16"/>ances
which
at first
seemed <lb n="c57-0017__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3074__Start"/>igmmatic<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3074__End"/>enigmatic. <note> o you pretty Pecksie! </note><lb n="c57-0018__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0018.05" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 3<lb n="c57-0018__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3096__Start"/>It was some time<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3096__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>A
considerable period elapsed before I discovered one <lb n="c57-0018__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0018__left_margin__1"/>of the causes of the uneasiness of this amiable
<lb n="c57-0018__main__4"/>family – <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3123__Start"/>Itw<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3123__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>It
was
poverty–
and they suffered <lb n="c57-0018__main__5"/>that evil in a very distressing
degree– Dur <lb n="c57-0018__main__6"/>ring
the
winter<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3143__Start"/>They often had hardly any<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3143__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__7"/>their
nourishment consisted entirely of
bread <lb n="c57-0018__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3149__Start"/>and –<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3149__End"/>
the vegetables of their
garden
and the <lb n="c57-0018__main__9"/>milk of one
cow
which
gave very little <lb n="c57-0018__main__10"/>during the
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3157__Start"/>hard<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3157__End"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3160__Start"/>monthes<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3160__End"/> winter
when
<lb n="c57-0018__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3164__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3164__End"/>
its masters could
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3168__Start"/>spare<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3168__End"/>scarcelyvery little <lb n="c57-0018__main__12"/>money towards the procure<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>any
food
for
it.
<lb n="c57-0018__main__13"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3198__Start"/>This state of poverty<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3198__End"/>
They
often
I
believe<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3201__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3201__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__14"/>suffered
the pangs of hunger very
poi <lb n="c57-0018__main__15"/>gnantly
especially the two
younger<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3217__Start"/>er part<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3217__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__16"/>for <metamark>^</metamark>several
times they
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3229__Start"/>often<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3229__End"/>
placed food before the old
<lb n="c57-0018__main__17"/>man
when
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3237__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3237__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3244__Start"/>were<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3244__End"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3249__Start"/>themselves in want of it<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3249__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__18"/>they had
none for
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3254__Start"/>their<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3254__End"/> themselves –This
<lb n="c57-0018__main__19"/>trait of kindness moved me sensibly. <lb n="c57-0018__main__20"/>I had been
accustomed
during the
night
<lb n="c57-0018__main__21"/>to steal a part of their store for my <lb n="c57-0018__main__22"/>own consumption; but when I found <lb n="c57-0018__main__23"/>that in doing this I inflicted pain on the <lb n="c57-0018__main__24"/>cottagers, I abstained, and satisfied
my <lb n="c57-0018__main__25"/>self
with
berries nuts
and
roots
which <lb n="c57-0018__main__26"/>I
<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3277__Start"/>found<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3277__End"/>gathered
from a neighbouring
wood.
I <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3289__Start"/>found<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3289__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>discovered
also <lb n="c57-0018__main__27"/>another means
by
which I was
able
<lb n="c57-0018__main__28"/>to assist their labours. I found that
the<lb n="c57-0019__main__1"/>youth
spent a great part of each <lb n="c57-0019__main__2"/>day in
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3313__Start"/>felling<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3313__End"/>
collecting wood for the <lb n="c57-0019__main__3"/>family
fire–and
during the
night
I often <lb n="c57-0019__main__4"/>took his
tools
the
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3321__Start"/>com<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3321__End"/>
use of which I <lb n="c57-0019__main__5"/>quickly
discovered
and brought home
<lb n="c57-0019__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3328__Start"/>for them<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3328__End"/>
firing sufficient
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for
the
consumption<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3341__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3341__End"/>of seve <lb n="c57-0019__main__7"/>ral days– <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>I remember
the first time that I <lb n="c57-0019__main__8"/>did this, the young
woman who
opened <lb n="c57-0019__main__9"/>the door in the
morning <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3367__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3367__End"/>appeared
greatly
sur <lb n="c57-0019__main__10"/>prisedastonished to see
a great pile of wood on <lb n="c57-0019__main__11"/>the
outside –
she
said
some words in a <lb n="c57-0019__main__12"/>loud voice, &
presently
the youth joined
<lb n="c57-0019__main__13"/>her
who also
appeared astonished. <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3390__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3390__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__main__14"/>I observed <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3395__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3395__End"/>
with
pleasure
that he <lb n="c57-0019__main__15"/>did not go to the
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3403__Start"/>wood<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3403__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>forest
that
day
but <lb n="c57-0019__main__16"/>spent it in repairing the
cottage
&
in
<lb n="c57-0019__main__17"/>cultivating the
garden.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0019__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3424__Start"/>Soon after<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3424__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>By
degrees
also
I made
another
discovery
<lb n="c57-0019__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3438__Start"/>which was that<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3438__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0019__left_margin__d1e3446__Start"/>to me<del loc="c57-0019__left_margin__d1e3446__End"/>
of still <lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__2"/>greater
<lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__3"/>moment <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to me
I
<lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__4"/>found<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that
these people
posessed
a
<lb n="c57-0019__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3488__Start"/>means<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3488__End"/>method
of communicating their
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3496__Start"/>ideas<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3496__End"/>experience
&
to
<lb n="c57-0019__main__21"/>feelings
one another by articulate
sounds which <lb n="c57-0019__main__22"/>they uttered <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3509__Start"/>som<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3509__End"/> —<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3514__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3514__End"/>
I
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3517__Start"/>often<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3517__End"/> percieved
that <lb n="c57-0019__main__23"/>the words they spoke
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sometimes
produced
plea <lb n="c57-0019__main__24"/>sure
pain, smiles or
sadness
in the <lb n="c57-0019__main__25"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/>minds
&countenances
of the
hearers–
This was <lb n="c57-0019__main__26"/>indeed a Godlike
science
and I ardently
<lb n="c57-0019__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3557__Start"/>wished<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3557__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/>desired
to become acquainted with
it–But
<lb n="c57-0019__main__28"/>I was baffled in every attempt
<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3573__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3573__End"/>I
made for this
purpose<lb n="c57-0019__main__29"/>Their
pronunciation was
quick
& the <lb n="c57-0019__main__30"/>words they
uttered <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3587__Start"/>seemed<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3587__End"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3591__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3591__End"/>
not
having<lb n="c57-0020__main__1"/>any
apparent
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3604__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3604__End"/>
connexion
with
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3607__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3607__End"/>
visible
<lb n="c57-0020__main__2"/>objects
I was unable to discover any clue <lb n="c57-0020__main__3"/>by which I could
unrable
the mystery <lb n="c57-0020__main__4"/>of their
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3619__Start"/>sounds.<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3619__End"/><del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3623__Start"/>application<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3623__End"/> reference..
By great
application how <lb n="c57-0020__main__5"/>ever
and after having remained
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>during
the space of several <lb n="c57-0020__main__6"/>revolutions of the moon in my
hovel
<lb n="c57-0020__main__7"/>I discovered the names that were given <lb n="c57-0020__main__8"/>to some of the most familiar objects <lb n="c57-0020__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0020__left_margin__1"/>of
discourse,
I learned
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>&
applied the
words
fire,
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3667__Start"/>milk<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3667__End"/>milk <lb n="c57-0020__main__10"/>bread&wood
I learned also the names <lb n="c57-0020__main__11"/>of the cottagers
themselves– <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3689__Start"/>but as<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3689__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__12"/>the<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>youth
& his companion had
h
each of them several
but <lb n="c57-0020__main__13"/>the old man had only
one
which <lb n="c57-0020__main__14"/>was
Father –
the girl was call<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3716__Start"/>ed
Sist<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3716__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__15"/>Sister
or
Agatha
and the youth
<lb n="c57-0020__main__16"/>Felix. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> brother
or
son
I
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3733__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3733__End"/>
cannot describe the delight <lb n="c57-0020__main__17"/>I felt when I
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3741__Start"/>discovered<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3741__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>learned
the ideas
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3752__Start"/>opp<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3752__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__18"/>appropriated
to each of these
sounds
<lb n="c57-0020__main__19"/>and was able to pronounce them.
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3759__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3759__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__20"/>I <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3767__Start"/>learned<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3767__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>distinguished
several other
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3778__Start"/>sounds<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3778__End"/> words
<lb n="c57-0020__main__21"/>without being able
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as
yet to understand
<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3793__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3793__End"/>
or <lb n="c57-0020__main__22"/>apply
them – <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3799__Start"/>Among these<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3799__End"/>
Such as
good<lb n="c57-0020__main__23"/>dearest – unhappy.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__24"/>I
spent the winter in this
manner–
<lb n="c57-0020__main__25"/>the gentle manners and beauty of the <lb n="c57-0020__main__26"/>cottagers greatly endeared them to
me–When
<lb n="c57-0020__main__27"/>they were
unhappy
I felt
depressed and<lb n="c57-0021__main__1"/>I
sympathized
in their joys. I saw few <lb n="c57-0021__main__2"/>human beings
besides them,
and if <lb n="c57-0021__main__3"/>any other happened to enter the
cottage
<lb n="c57-0021__main__4"/>their harsh
<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3839__Start"/>and rud<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3839__End"/>
manners & rude <lb n="c57-0021__main__5"/>gait only enhanced to me
<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3845__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3845__End"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3848__Start"/>my friends<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3848__End"/><lb n="c57-0021__main__6"/>the
superior
advantages
of my friends. <lb n="c57-0021__main__7"/>The
<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3859__Start"/>Father<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3859__End"/>
old man, I could
percieve,
<lb n="c57-0021__main__8"/>often endeavoured to encourage his
<lb n="c57-0021__main__9"/>children
as
I
sometimes
found that <lb n="c57-0021__main__10"/>he called
them. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
cast off their melancholy. He would talk in <lb n="c57-0021__main__11"/>a cheerful
accent
with an
<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3883__Start"/>aspect<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3883__End"/>expression of<lb n="c57-0021__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3891__Start"/>godn<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3891__End"/>
goodness that
<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3896__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3896__End"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3899__Start"/>gave<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3899__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3906__Start"/>delight.<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3906__End"/>bestowed pleasure<lb n="c57-0021__main__13"/><lb n="c57-0021__left_margin__1"/>even on me;
Agatha listened with
respect–
her eyes
<lb n="c57-0021__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3923__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e3923__End"/>
sometimes filled with

<lb n="c57-0021__main__19"/>It was not thus with Felix. He was <lb n="c57-0021__main__20"/>always the saddest of the

<lb n="c57-0021__main__21"/>even to my unpractised
